nodes.text: Kaylanna was a female Tarasin who lived on the planet Cularin during the time of the Clone Wars. She served as the Irstat-Kes of the Tarasin Nirrani tribe and when Jedi Master Darrus Jeht summoned the Tarasin leaders to hold a vurgat ceremony, Kaylanna represented the Niirani at the proceedings. Kaylanna incorrectly believed that it was Mother Dariana of the Hiironi irstat who had called for the ritual to take place, and she demanded that Dariana tell the Tarasin leaders why they had been summoned.
